aiContext.app: The user is using an app whose purpose is to empower users to achieve their goals, visions and dreams, which should always be considered in all responses.
aiContext.user: The user has {{country}} as their country of tax residency and the user is currently {{age}} years old, which should be considered in all responses.
aiContext.view: The user is currently in a module of the app described by "{{moduleDescription}}" on a screen titled "{{viewTitle}}" with the explanation "{{viewExplanation}}".

comingSoon.title: Coming soon
comingSoon.stayTuned: Stay tuned for the revolution of financial intelligence with Divizend!

settings.title: Settings

accountSection.title: Account
accountSection.bottomText: To modify your email address and for other profile settings, please visit app.divizend.com.

settings.logoutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?

resetProfile.title: Reset profile
resetProfile.message: Are you sure you want to reset your Companion profile? This action cannot be undone.

aiDisclaimer.title: AI-Native App Disclaimer
aiDisclaimer.message: First and foremost: This app is AI-native, which means that all information you enter will be processed using OpenAI APIs. By continuing to use this app, you agree to these terms.

taxResidency.title: Which country are you from?
taxResidency.message: More specifically, your country of tax residency.

birthday.title: When were you born?
birthday.message: Please enter your date of birth.

allSet.title: You're all set!
allSet.message: Thank you for completing the setup. You're now ready to start using the Companion!

learn.title: Visionary
learn.vision: The Visionary is the module of the Companion which wants to make you learn how to turn your desires, goals, visions and dreams into reality.

insights.title: Step 1: Insights

aiContext.displayedQuestions:
The user sees the following questions:
{{questions}}

insights.explanation: All this learning is fully personalized and happens at a pace that you choose yourself. To achieve this, you need to answer a few questions first, guided by the following. As a first step, your answers will be reformulated into insights about your financial life.
insights.explanation2: When you tap on a question, you can also generate new questions based on it.

defaultQuestions.question: What are your financial goals, dreams and aspirations?
What is your current financial situation?
Why do you want to learn more about finance?
How do financial topics currently make you feel?
What do you already know about finance?
Which values guide your financial decision-making?
Which financial topics are you interested in?
What do you need to feel financially secure?
In which areas of your financial life do you want to be more independent?
Which financial habits do you want to cultivate?

insights.title: Insights about your financial life
insights.bottomText: Your answers have been reformulated into clear statements about your financial life, which will be used to customize your learning experience. Of course you can also always add and remove insights later.

insights.confirmButton: Happy with these insights? Then let's confirm and continue!

removeInsight.message: Are you sure you want to remove this insight? This action cannot be undone.

goals.title: Step 2: Goals
goals.explanation: Based on the insights about your financial life, let's now determine concrete goals and visions for you. If you want to make a goal more precise or correct it, simply tap on it.

aiContext.insights:
The user has determined the following insights about their financial life:
{{insights}}

goals.confirmGoals: Goals clear? Then tap here to start realizing them!

realizeGoals.title: Welcome
realizeGoals.explanation: Which of your goals do you want to strive for today?

replaceGoalsAlert.title: Redetermine goals
replaceGoalsAlert.message: Are you sure you want to reinitialize your goals? If you confirm, all current goals within this view will be replaced.

addManualGoal.title: Add a new goal
addManualGoal.placeholder: Formulate it as freely as you like.

removeGoalAlert.message: Are you sure you want to remove this goal and all associated data? This action cannot be undone.

refineGoal.placeholder: What do you want to change about this goal?

secondary.title: Manage subgoals
secondary.explanation: If this goal feels too large for you or you don't know how to start, you can divide it into smaller, manageable subgoals.

generateButton.title: Tap here to divide the selected goal into subgoals

replaceGoalsAlert.title: Redetermine subgoals
replaceGoalsAlert.message: Are you sure you want to reinitialize the subgoals for this goal? If you confirm, all current subgoals within this view will be replaced and all information associated with the current subgoals will be removed. This action cannot be undone.

addManualGoal.title: Add a new subgoal
addManualGoal.placeholder: Formulate it as freely as you like.

removeGoalAlert.message: Are you sure you want to remove this subgoal and all associated data? This action cannot be undone.

refineGoal.placeholder: What do you want to change about this subgoal?

realities.title: Details, context, decisions
realities.addRealityPrompt: What is true about this goal right now? Feel free to also add reasons, explanations and every else you deem relevant.
realities.explanation: These are facts associated with the status quo of your path towards achieving this goal. Make sure to always keep these updated and as accurate as possible.
realities.removeReality: Do you want to remove this fact?
realities.refineReality: What do you want to change about this fact?

assess.title: Add a new fact
assess.explanation: Answer any of the following questions to continue assessing the status quo of your path towards achieving this goal. Or use the button at the bottom to add a new fact manually.

learningIntentions.title: Learning
learningIntentions.explanation: These are topics you can learn about to achieve this goal more effectively.

country.gs: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
country.sh: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
